public class Arithmetic<X extends Number>

Provides generic arithmetic for all subclasses of class Number.

addTargetType

public static <Y extends Number> void addTargetType(Class<Y> targetType,
                                                    TypeConverter<Y> converter,
                                                    Operations<Y> operations)
Adds a new target type for generic Arithmetic. After this method is called once, the new target type is known by all newly created Arithmetic instances.

Type Parameters:
Y - Target type
Parameters:
targetType - Class object of target type
converter - TypeConverter for target type
operations - Operations for target type
